name: Why is it Raining Bricks
description:
It’s raining bricks, and you’re homeless, you decide to go running through the city to get bricks to make yourself a new home. Watch out for the cars!

Software Used

-Unity 3D

-Blender

Substance Painter

Credits

This game was created by Willian Freitas, Theo Gorck and Nokdef for Ludum Dare 45.

Willian Freitas’s Portifolio: https://www.artstation.com/willianfreitas

Theodoro Gorck’s Twitter: https://twitter.com/gorck_theodoro

Nokdef’s Twitter: https://twitter.com/mrnokdef
